alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 8:49PM AKST until December 26 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES NORTHERN PANHANDLE SUNDAY EVENING... Snow rates have increase over the northern Panhandle resulting in reduced visibilities at Haines and Skagway. Snow rates expected to continue until late tonight for the northern locations. Local freezing rain possible around the Juneau area. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain possible especially in wind sheltered valleys with ice accumulation up to a tenth of an inch. Periods of light snow will continue tonight possibly mixed with some light rain. Little additional accumulation is anticipated. * WHERE...City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow rates will be Sun evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
